message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. I believe it's a fair price given its value to you. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not sure I can go any higher than that.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and understand your position. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $13,250 is my final offer. It's still a great deal for you, and it allows me to make a reasonable profit. Let me know if you're willing to accept.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit too high on the price. I'm willing to meet you at $13,000, but that's as low as I can go. I'm not willing to go any higher than that.
